physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Ruddy, somewhat overweight woman with a moon face. Affect was jovial despite evident anxiety and audible wheezing.
Extreme breathing difficulty: erratic breathing, gasping for breath, face red and puffed, glassy eyes, appeared extremely anxious.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: By the third session of biofeedback therapy, marked clinical improvement was noted in her breathing pattern and anxiety level.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Persistent bilateral hand tremor and bilateral cogwheel rigidity of upper extremities.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: After discontinuation of haloperidol and tapering lithium, confusion, drowsiness, psychomotor slowing, rigidity, and glucosuria resolved within three days.
